name: Broccoli and Tortellini Salad
author: AFMC
summary: Crisp, fresh broccoli and cheese tortellini with a creamy dressing are the basis of this salad.  Raisins, sunflower seeds and red onion dress it up. This recipe is most requested at potlucks.
ingredients: 3 heads fresh broccoli, cut into florets
directions: Place bacon in a large, deep skillet
Cook over medium high heat until evenly brown
Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Cook tortellini in boiling water  for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente
Drain, and rinse under cold water
In a small bowl, mix together mayonnaise, sugar and vinegar to make the dressing
In a large bowl, combine broccoli, tortellini, bacon, raisins, sunflower seeds and red onion
Pour dressing over salad, and toss
